name: Doomitto
description:
MUSIC-FIXED VERSION

DOOMITTO is a 183kB Doom-demake for tiny Pokitto handheld console

Based on Miloslav Ciz's 3D engine, music by Benjamin Dibbert (Nordischsound.de)

Art, Design and additional code by Jonne

Original idea and e1m1 map layout by Wuuff

INSTALLATION

Copy Doomitto.pop to your Game SD card / upload to pokitto

put e1m1_8k.raw in the /music folder of your gamedisk SD card!

Happy monster hunting!

Jonne
